Name: Dutch Artist's Special
Ingredients: 15 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of redcurrant bunch laid across rim.
Review: Bready genever is aromatised with sherry and kirsch while red currant syrup provides the main flavour with its richness balanced by lemon juice.
History: A riff on the classic Artist's Special cocktail , which is based on Irish Whiskey. The only change is to use Dutch genever instead of whisky – hence the name. Created in January 2016 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Dutch Artist's Special contains 158 calories
